reviews.review:
FINGERS DEDOS O PALITOS DE QUESO

Ingredientes

500g de un bloque de un queso blando, que se derrita fácilmente
3 huevos
pan rallado
sal
Aceite

Preparacion

1.- Lo primero, es cortar el bloque de queso. 

2.- Pasamos los fingers primero, por huevo batido.Después por pan rallado, después nuevamente por huevo batido y nuevamente por pan rallado.

3.- Una vez empanados todos, los guardamos en la nevera alrededor de una hora

4.- Pasado el tiempo, los freímos en abundante aceite, a fuego fuerte.

I am having fun, but playing against bots is no substitute for playing against real people. I don't know if I have grown bad habits or what, but I usually get destroyed. You won't be good immediately.
топ игра советую а я сегодня побрился

Having played this game for 3.6 thousand hours, I feel I have formulated an accurate opinion of the "fun-ness" of this game. It's not. It is rage inducing and turns me into a person I do not like! However, I still love this game for some damn reason and will probably never stop playing. F*** CS and don't get addicted.

I've been playing this game for 6 years now... i have never had such a bad experience after coming back to this game in 2021... I have played 10 matches in a row with only cheaters in either my team or their team... its so sad too see how this game became after they made it free... the whole trust factor got fucked up and now the game its ruined by 12 year olds with cheats... its sad to see that the mm its trash right now....

I ranked up step by step with almost no problems until I reached LE,first game in LE was hell,after that I started to get cheaters in every single game,last 11-12 games have been filled with cheaters,how is this game anticheat so bad?
